attributes.action: Keep the Pound in the United Kingdom and not Join the European single Currency the Euro
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The United Kingdom should keep the Pound Currency, please sign the petition

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Keep the Pound in the United Kingdom and not Join the European single Currency the Euro."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 


http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20296


Prime Minister's Office
